2. Mutant - A mutant is an individual who has a mutation in a particular gene or genetic locus. In the context of the paragraph, the mutant refers to an individual who has a rare mutation.
3. TSD - TSD stands for "Thymine Dimers," which are small mutations that can occur in the DNA of an individual. In the context of the paragraph, TSD refers to a common mutation that may be confused with the rare mutation in question.
